gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 110, Heat 106
gameRecap.excerpt: Boston sweeps the season series against Miami as they defeat the Heat, 110-106. The "Boston Big 3" combined for 71 as Jayson Tatum with the double-double (26 points, 10 rebounds, nine assists), Kristaps Porzingis (25 points, nine rebounds), and Jaylen Brown (20 points, nine rebounds) lead the way for Boston. Bam Adebayo led the way and recorded his 28th double-double of the season with 22 points, 13 rebounds, and four assists while Tyler Herro tallied 24 points (four 3PM), five rebounds, and four assists for Miami in the losing effort. Boston wins and improves to 41-12 on the season, while Miami moves to 28-25 with the loss.
